data.title: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad: Third University in Iran
data.meta_description: The Department of Economics is an outstanding department of its kind in the North-East of Iran attempting its best to train specialist in areas such as Business Economics, Pure Economics, Economic Development, and Economics of Energy.
data.text:
Department of Economics

Training outstanding experts in theoretical and applied economics is the main concern of our Doctoral program which was established in 2007. The graduates’ capabilities will help produce knowledge, educate specialists for training others and be able to take over academic and executive positions at the Ferdowsi University of Mashhad and other universities, institutions of higher education, scientific and research institutions, and highly ranked governmental positions in the Khorasan Razavi Province. The graduates are also expected to be able to analyze problems, acknowledge issues and realize the reasons behind economic problems and issues and provide suitable solutions.

These programs mainly concentrate on: Business Economics, Pure Economics, Economic Development, and Economics of Energy. More

Head of the Department of Economics Mahdi Khodaparst Mashhadi Associate Professor Department of Economics

m_khodaparast@um.ac.ir +985138806348
